001package net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.LastInputStoredNeuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.NeuronFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
009
010public class PerceptronUpdateRule implements Optimizer.Stochastic<Perceptron, Float> {
011
012    @Override
013    public void optimize(Perceptron perceptron, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective, int step) {
014        Float[] estimate = perceptron.estimate(sample.features());
015        for (int i = 0; i < estimate.length; i++) {
016            int sign = Floats.greaterThan(sample.targetOutputs()[i], 0.0f) ? +1 : -1;
017            LastInputStoredNeuron neuron = perceptron.getNeuron(2, i, LastInputStoredNeuron.class);
018            if (!Floats.equals(sample.targetOutputs()[i], estimate[i])) {
019                updateParameters(neuron, sign);
020            }
021        }
022    }
023
024    private void updateParameters(LastInputStoredNeuron neuron, float y) {
025        NeuronFunction neuronFunction = neuron.getNeuronFunction();
026        neuronFunction.adjustParameter(0, y);
027        for (int d = 1; d < neuron.arity(); d++) {
028            neuronFunction.adjustParameter(d, y * neuron.getStoredInput(d));
029        }
030    }
031}
